# Kano Backlog - Derived/Cache Data (never ignore canonical data)
# Generated by kano-backlog admin init

# IMPORTANT: Never ignore project config files
# .kano/backlog_config.toml should always be committed

# Local CLI state and cache (project-level, not backlog-level)
.kano/cache/
.kano/debug/

# Cache and derived indexes (regenerable)
_kano/backlog/**/.cache/
_kano/backlog/**/_index/

# Logs and temporary files
_kano/backlog/_logs/
_kano/backlog/_tmp_tests/
_kano/backlog/_trash/

# Sandbox environments (ephemeral)
_kano/backlog_sandbox/

# Topic raw materials (cache, not source-of-truth)
_kano/backlog/topics/**/materials/

# LLM analysis outputs (derived from deterministic reports)
_kano/backlog/views/_analysis/
_kano/backlog/**/views/_analysis/

# Workset deliverables (per-item scratch space)
_kano/backlog/.cache/worksets/

# Vector databases and embeddings (regenerable)
*.sqlite3
*.faiss
*.pkl

# Effective config snapshots (deprecated, moved to .kano/debug/)
_kano/backlog/**/effective_config.toml
